import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-request-filter-modal', templateUrl: './request-filter-modal.component.html', styleUrls: ['./request-filter-modal.component.css'] }) export class RequestFilterModalComponent { activeLink: string = ''; setActiveLink(link: string, event: Event): void { event.preventDefault(); // Prevent default link behavior this.activeLink = link; } }
